Item.Caption: During the session of the UN Security Council
Istanbul - the former center of the mighty Ottoman Empire
New York sometimes called the capital of the world
Houses of Parliament. Belfast, Northern Ireland
Queen Elizabeth II is head of the British Commonwealth of Nations
Star-striped flag of the United States - a symbol of a federated system of the country: 50 stars represent the states of state
Blue helmets - of the UN, performing peacekeeping and humanitarian missions in many parts of the world
Traditionally neutral Switzerland has only recently become a member of the UN
The traditional way of life preserved in many regions of Eastern Europe
